name: Search Stocks Test
description: Test case for searching stocks by symbol or company name through agent interaction

parts.text:
I'm sorry, I was unable to find any stocks using the tag "electric vehicles." It's possible that the tag is not supported or there are no stocks categorized under that specific tag.

I can search for stocks by other categories if you have another one in mind, or you can try a more general search for a company by name or symbol.
